programlisting:
<CsoundSynthesizer> <CsOptions> ; Select audio/midi flags here according to platform -odac ;;;realtime audio out ;-iadc ;;;uncomment -iadc if realtime audio input is needed too ; For Non-realtime ouput leave only the line below: ; -o inletk.wav -W ;;; for file output any platform </CsOptions> <CsInstruments>
sr = 44100 ksmps = 32 nchnls = 2 0dbfs = 1
connect "bend", "bendout", "guitar", "bendin"
instr bend
kbend line p4, p3, p5 outletk "bendout", kbend endin
instr guitar
kbend inletk "bendin" kpch pow 2, kbend/12 printk2 kpch asig oscili .4, 440*kpch, 1 outs asig, asig endin
</CsInstruments> <CsScore>
f1 0 1024 10 1
i"guitar" 0 5 8.00 i"bend" 3 .2 -12 12 i"bend" 4 .1 -17 40 e </CsScore> </CsoundSynthesizer>
